data.title: TABASCAL: Modeling and subtraction of moving radio-frequency interference in interferometric data
data.name: tabascal
data.description: TrAjectory BAsed RFI Subtraction and CALibration (TABASCAL) of radio interferometry data. A source to visibility model for astronomical and RFI sources including near-field effects. Visibility data is jointly calibrated with excision of specific RFI contamination.

evidence: "Trajectory Based RFI Subtraction and Calibration (tabascal) of radio interferometry data. A source to visibility model for RFI sources... Visibility data is jointly calibrated and cleaned..." (domain-specific analysis/simulation tool users run).

"You can install `tabascal` with pip alone inside an environment of your choice..." and multiple command line scripts are provided: `sim-vis`, `flag-data`, `image`, `src-extract`, `extract` (indicating an end-user application for simulations and analysis).
